roleset.name: splitting in three
roleset.note: TRIFURCATION-N NOTES: Relation to verb-bifurcate.01. (from trifurcation.01-n)

example.name: trifurcate-v
example.text: [Western social movements]-1 have a tendency *PRO*-1 to "trifurcate" into three trends: liberal reformist, socialist and countercultural romanticist.
example.arg: into three trends: liberal reformist, socialist and countercultural romanticist

example.name: trifurcation-n
example.text: Here, we report the trifurcation of the right common carotid artery in a male cadaver aged about 55 years.
example.arg: of the right common carotid artery
in a male cadaver aged about 55 years
